attributes.action: Campaign to aknowledge Arsenals 3 World Cup wins by adding the stars to the shirt
attributes.additional_details: as a massive Arsenal fan I find it distressing that we have never acknowledged the fact that we have had several players involved in 3 of the last 5 winning World Cup teams and aim to bring this to public attention by getting the powers that be to add the 3 stars to our shirt we so rightly deserve
